title: How to know when you are your true self - Quora

response.answer_text: You simply know it. It sometimes happen. Not often. But these are moments with such clairvoyance that you actually do know when that happens. There are many different ways to feel that way (meditation, yoga, spiritual experiences, psychedelic experiences, etc.). Barely no one ever is his true self; these are special moments through which you can gain monumental insight. Life is a journey through which we find ourselves in various positions and locations. If you truly want to know yourself, life will take you towards the right direction. All you need is trust and patience. But you will get there, I promise!

We are constantly changing throughout our lives so actually we are already our true selves. Just continue asking what is most true about you, if this is what you want most to do. What it means to be true to you, only you can figure out.
